answers: i played last season , and then mommy made me do cheer
generation: i like to play with my friends on the playground.

passages.title: Going Home
passages.text: I am far from home. I miss my family. One day I realized I did not have to live far away. I moved home. My family was happy to have my back.

passages.title: New Paint
passages.text: Today I decided to paint my laundry room. It was very hard to move both appliances. I had to call my friend to help me move the washer. He helped me clear the room and helped me paint. I was glad I called my friend for help.

passages.title: New puppy
passages.text: I really wanted a puppy. I had never had a pet before. I begged my parents to get my one. My parents refused. Finally my parents agreed to buy my one.

passages.title: Get A Life
passages.text: I loved my mother. But one evening I broke my mother's heart. My mother called out for me like I always did. But I was in a bad mood and snapped at my mother. I broke my mother's heart when I told her to get a life.

passages.title: New House
passages.text: My family was house hunting for a new place to live. I didn't want to move to a new house. I would have to leave behind my best friends. My father explained I would make new friends. My father was right in time I made new friends.

passages.title: Rescue
passages.text: One day I decided to visit my friend. When I got there I saw that the house was on fire. I tried to get inside but the door was locked. I then kicked it down inside. I found my friend on the floor. I was able to get me out and I saved my friend's life.
